an3.140:4.1: * “Tayo ca, bhikkhave, assakhaḷuṅke desessāmi tayo ca purisakhaḷuṅke.
an3.140:4.2: Taṃ suṇātha, sādhukaṃ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
an3.140:4.3: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṃ.
an3.140:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco assakhaḷuṅko javasampanno hoti;
an3.140:5.4: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco assakhaḷuṅko javasampanno ca hoti vaṇṇasampanno ca;
an3.140:5.6: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco assakhaḷuṅko javasampanno ca hoti vaṇṇasampanno ca ārohapariṇāhasampanno ca.
an3.140:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco purisakhaḷuṅko javasampanno hoti;
an3.140:6.4: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco purisakhaḷuṅko javasampanno ca hoti vaṇṇasampanno ca;
an3.140:6.6: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco purisakhaḷuṅko javasampanno ca hoti vaṇṇasampanno ca ārohapariṇāhasampanno ca.
an3.140:7.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ‘idaṃ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti … pe …
an3.140:7.6: Abhidhamme kho pana abhivinaye pañhaṃ puṭṭho saṃsādeti, no vissajjeti.
an3.140:7.10: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, purisakhaḷuṅko javasampanno hoti;
an3.140:8.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, purisakhaḷuṅko javasampanno ca hoti vaṇṇasampanno ca;
an3.140:8.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ‘idaṃ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti … pe …
an3.140:8.6: Abhidhamme kho pana abhivinaye pañhaṃ puṭṭho vissajjeti, no saṃsādeti.
an3.140:8.10: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, purisakhaḷuṅko javasampanno ca hoti vaṇṇasampanno ca;
an3.140:9.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, purisakhaḷuṅko javasampanno ca hoti vaṇṇasampanno ca ārohapariṇāhasampanno ca?
an3.140:9.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ‘idaṃ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti … pe …
an3.140:9.5: Abhidhamme kho pana abhivinaye pañhaṃ puṭṭho vissajjeti, no saṃsādeti.
an3.140:9.9: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, purisakhaḷuṅko javasampanno ca hoti vaṇṇasampanno ca ārohapariṇāhasampanno ca.
